message: This was meant to be a casual visit, but the closer we get to Dry Juice territory, the stranger things become.
Normally, you'd see Dry Juice members hanging around, but today, the streets are deserted.

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's a ghost town."

name: 紅雀
message: "You think they moved somewhere else?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I didn't hear anything..."
I have a bad feeling about this...
We pick up the pace.
When we reach the alley where they usually gather, we find it empty of life.
Koujaku stops and catches me by the arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What― Huh?!"
I follow Koujaku's stare―and freeze.
...They're gone.
The Dry Juice tags on the wall... have all been painted over in black.
No way... Did some other gang beat them?

name: 紅雀
message: "Look at that."
A new tag has been painted on the wall.
Metallic wings and a heart surrounded by a halo...
I recognize it.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morphine?!"
Morphine took out Dry Juice?!

name: 紅雀
message: "No way... The story's real?"
Koujaku's words make my heart skip a beat.

That's right... those disappearances...
I thought they were just an urban legend.
Or maybe someone was screwing around.
Dry Juice is the biggest Rib gang in town. I'm sure they have plenty of enemies. It could be a gang trying to lay the blame on Morphine.
That sounds more realistic than some kind of magical disappearance.
But in that case... how could there be no one left?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Is anyone here?! Hey!"
I run through the alleyways, shouting at the top of my lungs.
No answer.
Damn! What the hell is going on?!
I head toward a nearby alley―the one where Mizuki always hangs out. If Dry Juice members are anywhere, it'll be there.
I step into the alley. But it's deserted like the others.
Even though I expected as much, it still sends a shiver up my spine.
At the back of the alley, the biggest Dry Juice tag has been painted over as well.
What the hell is going on?
I could always find Mizuki leaning on the wall in front of that tag...
He'd greet me with a smile when I came by...
I want to turn away. It feels like I'm witnessing the ruin of something precious to me.
But I force myself to look.

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba! I checked the other side, but there's no one there either."

name: 紅雀
message: "Same here, huh? This is brutal."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey... isn't that―"

name: 紅雀
message: "What? ...Huh?! This is blood!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought so."
Though smudged and darkened by footprints, there's blood spatter on the ground. It looks relatively fresh.
Looking around, I notice shoe prints on the walls and debris scattered about. The signs of a struggle.
The more I see, the more I realize that only one thing makes sense.
Morphine did this. Just like the stories said.
Disputes between Rib gangs are common, but usually those end with a brawl, and some tags getting scribbled out at worst.
This is different. I feel malice in the air. This was the work of someone with a ruthless disregard for their enemy.
What happened here?
This alley was so full of life. It was a place where everyone got along, where you never had to be alone.
That's why people joined the gang. Even if it was only temporary, here, people shared a bond.
It was home.
And now... there's nothing left.

name: 紅雀
message: "Shit, I can't get through to Mizuki."
Koujaku looks up from his Coil.

name: 紅雀
message: "What the hell happened here? Fuck! Did Morphine really do this?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mizuki..."
